messages.title: Strong and Stable Leadership in the National Interest
messages.content:
Your vote for the Conservatives in this election will help strengthen our negotiating hand in Europe and help deliver a country that works for everyone, not just a privileged few.
As we implement the referendum decision, we need a government with a strong mandate to get the best for Britain in the detailed negotiations over the next two years. Theresa May has the strength of character to achieve this and bring the country together as we build a new relationship with our friends in Europe and around the world.
Your vote for the Conservatives will help reform our economy so that it works for everyone; maintain our progress in reducing the deficit while increasing funding for the NHS; and focus our energies on building a better and more secure future for our children and grandchildren.
Your vote for the Conservatives is also to keep the strong, effective and trusted local leadership that Richard Fuller has demonstrated since being elected.
The choice at this election is between strong and stable leadership in the national interest with Theresa May and the Conservatives – or weak and unstable coalition government led by Jeremy Corbyn.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Continuing to invest in education and training so that people in Bedford and Kempston have the right skills to succeed.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Encouraging people to start a business
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Making it easier for people to start and grow their own business through enterprise and investment initiatives.
Improving transport links to major destinations to boost local economy and job opportunities.
Making sure that local residents keep more of their hard-earned money with lower taxes.
Protecting and improving services at Bedford Hospital to ensure high-quality local healthcare.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Making it easier to buy your own home
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Supporting home ownership with initiatives to help people buy their first home.
Securing better employment opportunities and fair wages for working people.
